Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use your voice to control your Terma Smart heating devices

Link your Terma Smart account by enabling this Skill in the Alexa Application.

Here is a short checklist of what you can do with Terma Smart skill for Amazon Alexa:

1. Checking the current state of your home defined zones

To get the current temperature of the [zone] simply ask “Alexa, what is the temperature of the [zone]?”.

Will tell you the current set point temperature in the [zone].


2. Controlling your Terma Smart devices

“Alexa, set the [zone] temperature to <25 degrees celsius> / <77 degrees fahrenheit>”.

Terma Smart will set your [zone] to the desired temperature.


Where the [zone] is a placeholder for your zone name ie. garage/living room/kitchen etc. 

You set and change the [zone] name in the app, but please make sure they do not contain any special characters

and it works best if you use simple and short names which you can pronounce easily.
